title: Galarian Darmanitan

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-**Icicle Crash** - Attack a player, with a 30% chance of nullifying their night ability that night.
-**Ice Punch** - Attack a playerz with a 10% chance of Freezing (post 130 Iceberg) them.
-**Rock Slide** Attack and roleblock a target.

fields.name: Pokémon Ability:
fields.value: **Gorilla Tactics** Activate this ability. 2 uses. When activated, doubles the user's attack value for two nights, but locks the user into using the same ability both nights.

desc:
Post 2453
*In mother Galar, Darmanitan faints you.*
